metadata.title: CVE-2018-5804 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
A type confusion error within the "identify()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.8 can be exploited to trigger a division by zero.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-5804` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.11-1
libraw20 - 0.18.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.11-1').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
